title: kailAsacala vAsA
sahitya:
kaimmAru sheivaduNDO gAndhijikku


anupallavi

  emmAn ellOrum inbuTrirukka tAnuyir vAzhnda
 pemmAn tanai ninaindu pulambudanri vEru


caraNam 1   ANDiyum arashanum onrAi ninaittavarkku
 tINDAmai pEyai kuzhi tONDi pudaittavarkku
  caraNam 2    shEikku varum nOikku tAi marunduNbadu pOl
 tAi nATTin tollaigaTku tANuNNAdiruppOrkku
  caraNam 3   pOr munai vATkoNDu uyirattam shindAmal
 pUrNa sutantiram kaNDa nambA bhuvirkku
